name: d3/recommended-wordpress-plugins-metapackage
description: our recommended modules for the WordPress CMS

suggest.roots/bedrock: Ein gut gepflegtes Framework für eine technisch moderne und sichere Installation
suggest.wpackagist-plugin/antispam-bee: Sag 'Auf Wiedersehen' zu Kommentar-Spam auf deiner WordPress-Installation. Antispam Bee blockiert Spam-Kommentare und -Trackbacks effektiv und das ganz ohne Captchas oder personenbezogene Daten an die Services Dritter zu versenden. Es ist kosten- wie werbefrei und 100% konform mit der Datenschutzgrundverordnung (DSGVO).
suggest.wpackagist-plugin/taxonomy-terms-order: Search OXID admin globally for products, categories, clients, etc.
suggest.wpackagist-plugin/unfiltered-mu: Unfiltered MU gives Administrators and Editors the unfiltered_html capability. This prevents WordPress MU/WordPress 3.0 multisite from stripping <iframe>, <embed>, etc. from these users‘ posts. Authors and Contributors do not get this capability for security reasons.
suggest.wpackagist-plugin/wp-sentry-integration: This plugin can report PHP errors (optionally) and JavaScript errors (optionally) to Sentry and integrates with its release tracking.
suggest.wpackagist-plugin/wp-updates-notifier: notifies in case of available update
suggest.koodimonni-language/de_de: Full Wordpress translation (including themes and core plugins) for German - de_de
suggest.bjornjohansen/wplang: Composer plugin to download translation files from wordpress.org
suggest.wpackagist-plugin/better-search-replace: search and replace in whole database
